profile_desc: This is how others will see you on the site.
account_desc: This is how others will see you on the site.
socials_desc: Enable authentication with other social accounts.
bio_desc: A short description about yourself and your work, only visible when shared.
public_profile_desc: Do you want other people to see your profile and your work?
deletion_warning: You cannot undo this action. Deleting your account will erase all of your data.
delete_workspace_desc: Deleting "{{name}}" will also delete all projects and notes stored within it. This cannot be undone.
